programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep5
programme.desc: The First Picture Show - When Thunk invents the first-ever movie using shadow puppets, everyone in Ahhh! Valley loves it...until they are shocked by the ending.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep31
programme.desc: Swords Man - Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep32
programme.desc: Escape Goat - Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep31
programme.desc: Buffalord Soldier - Astrid comes down with the Odin's Revenge flu and the Riders must search for the cure by finding a nearly extinct Buffalord dragon before Viggo does.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep32
programme.desc: A Grim Retreat - The Riders head to a tropical island for fun in the sun, not realizing it's infested with Grimora Leeches which drives their dragons to turn on them.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert & The Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Postcards From The Veg - Pieface laments that Paul is looking peaky and needs a holiday. Dennis has a plan! But its only when Walter kidnaps Paul that he realises his chips are down and he needs to get the gangs help to put things right!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Whole Tooth - Gnasher gnashes Walters portrait so he retaliates with a titanium sausage leaving Gnasher toothless, miserable and without his mojo! Dennis and the gang will have to stage a heist to 'borrow' some diamonds until Gnasher's teeth grow back!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep13
programme.desc: The Black Paladin - Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Pony Tales Collection Ep57
programme.desc: The Mystery Of The Golden Unicorn - After finding a majestic horse in the wild, Lucky and the girls set out to solve the mystery of where she came from -- and where she truly belongs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep56
programme.desc: Bridge On The River Mort - King Julien decides to get his kingdom back; Sage and Clover train with Sage's Master; Mort rallies everyone to build an escape tunnel

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep4
programme.desc: Krunkle Krush / Beauty Tip - Tip spies on Oh when he has his first date with a strange Boov named Krunkle./Tip competes against rival Pom Pom Pappernacky in a beauty pageant.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep30
programme.desc: The Muscle - When traveling to recruit the mighty Golem for their mission, Puss tries to prove that no one is better than him at being "the muscle" of the team.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep30
programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.desc: Cult Fiction - King Julien resumes his trek to reclaim his kingdom; Clover and Sage find aa self-help seminar led by an old friend; Mort finally contacts King Julien

programme.desc: Eye'Ll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.desc: Eep-Over/Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep34
programme.desc: Stryke Out - Hiccup and Toothless are captured and must find a way to escape the Dragon Fighting arena and survive an attack from the fearsome Triple Stryke dragon.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Rupert & The Hilarious Hiccups - Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda are playing in the forest when Freddy and Freda spot a colourful box dropped by a travelling salesman. They open it expecting to find sandwiches or even a cake but get more than they expected when hiccups jump out of the box instead. They try to run away from the hiccups but crash into the travelling salesman and his colourful cart and upset a box of yawns and a box of giggling noises too. Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda discover that the noises are very infectious and come up with a plan to help the travelling salesman capture the naughty noises again. Greedy Freddy and Freda still haven't learnt their lesson. They find the remainder of the Elf's lunch and guzzle it all up only to catch the hiccups for real and learn that they need to be less greedy in future.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Rupert And The Snowglobe - When Rupert, Bill and Ping-Pong arrive at the beach one sunny day they are amazed to find a small snowstorm raging over one distinct area. Jack Frost emerges and explains that he has come early this year because he wants to catch some sun. He shows them the snowglobe he uses to control the icy storm. The friends play in the snow unaware that Ming has got hold of the snowglobe and is shaking it up, causing the storm to grow out of control....

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky'S Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep79
programme.desc: Fifi'S Filmshow - Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep80
programme.desc: Pip And The Genie - Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Freewheelin’ - It’s the famous Beanotown Freewheeler Derby! During practice, the gang realize Walter’s go-cart is especially speedy. Worried that Walter will beat his record, Dennis creates a lighter, faster cart but loses control and injures himself. It is up to Rubi’s wheelchair know how and Dennis’ super speedy carting skills to win the race.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Were-Walter - There's a werewolf-type creature on the prowl and suspicion falls on Gnasher. Dennis has to prove his best pal's innocence as the full moon shines down on Beanotown...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Strawberries - Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Swing - When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Best Fin-Ship Day / The Great Skate Case - Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever. // When Vola's skatefish board goes missing before a big event, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson are on the case.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Crystal catastrophe / Good Steel bad Steel - Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington Plays Hide And Seek - Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep312
programme.desc: The Big Ant-venture - Blaze and Zeg are on Animal Island when they discover a world of tiny creatures right under their tires: Insect City! The friends transform into a super-strong ant and a bouncy grasshopper for their littlest big adventure yet!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Falcon Quest - In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day! - Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The SS Friendship! - Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them.

programme.desc: Artus At All Costs/The Long Journey – Part 2 - Artus has hurt his hand. The Trio tries to replace him during his convalescence, in vain.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep117/Ep135
programme.desc: The Ten Gallon Trophy/Dino Sore - When Bopper runs off with Bo's prized Ten Gallon Trophy Hat, Tango believes that she has to be like Blitz and Clover in order to help the gang catch the elusive pachycephalosaur.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep317/Ep336
programme.desc: Calls Of The Wild In Big Sky Park/Ranger Robot In Big Sky Park - Rob records animal calls in the jungle when a Macaw causes chaos by mimicking the calls.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep112/Ep139
programme.desc: The Missing Mushlet/Bouncing Back - So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep1/Ep5
programme.desc: Beware The Beast From Below/The Song Of Mystery - The gang has to battle police and parental involvement while trying to solve the mystery of a Slime Mutant who's trapping his victims in a gelatinous cocoon.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep27/Ep32
programme.desc: The Night The Clown Cried/Art Of Darkness - With the gang split up, Crystal Cove is being tormented by an evil-man-baby called Crybaby Clown!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep11/Ep37
programme.desc: The Secret Serum/The Midnight Zone - There's a vampire loose in the town -- terrorizing the residents and stealing an odd assortment of loot.

programme.title: Travelogue

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China's perspective, policies and stories.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. programme.desc: The Secrets of Opus Dei - Faith, Power, Manipulation - For many critics, the arch-conservative Catholic community Opus Dei is a diabolical sect. programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Grasso vs. Araujo
programme.desc: Prelims - Since moving to the flyweight division, Mexico’s Alexa Grasso has been unstopabble, defeating Ji Yeon Kim, Maycee Barber and Joanne Wood. On October 15 at the APEX in Las Vegas, the Top Five ranked Grasso will make her case for a 125-pound title shot when she battles Brazil’s Viviane Araujo in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. Also holding down a spot in the flyweight rankings, Araujo has already faced former world titleholders Alexis Davis, Jessica Eye, Roxanne Modafferi and Katlyn Chookagian, and she expects a win over Grasso will earn her a crack at the crown

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Grasso vs. Araujo
programme.desc: Main Event - Since moving to the flyweight division, Mexico’s Alexa Grasso has been unstopabble, defeating Ji Yeon Kim, Maycee Barber and Joanne Wood. On October 15 at the APEX in Las Vegas, the Top Five ranked Grasso will make her case for a 125-pound title shot when she battles Brazil’s Viviane Araujo in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. Also holding down a spot in the flyweight rankings, Araujo has already faced former world titleholders Alexis Davis, Jessica Eye, Roxanne Modafferi and Katlyn Chookagian, and she expects a win over Grasso will earn her a crack at the crown
